attires.name: Kimono
attires.description: A traditional Japanese garment, and the national dress of Japan. The kimono is a T-shaped, wrapped-front garment with square sleeves and a rectangular body, and is worn left side over right.

attires.name: Yukata
attires.description: A casual version of the kimono. It is a robe usually made of cotton or synthetic fabric, wrapped around the body and fastened with a sash (obi).

attires.name: Haori
attires.description: A traditional Japanese hip- or thigh-length jacket worn over a kimono.
